level.heading: Penalties - Unauthorized use of term "cooperative"; existing cooperatives.
Temporary Amendment of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 2(b) of the Cooperative Association Temporary Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Law 11-265, April 25, 1997, law notification 43 DCR 4355).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary amendment of section, see § 2(b) of the Cooperative Association Emergency Amendment Act of 1996 (D.C. Act 11-483, January 13, 1997, 44 DCR 626), § 2(b) of the Cooperative Association Legislative Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-59, March 31, 1997, 44 DCR 2235), and § 2(b) of the Cooperative Association Second Emergency Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Act 12-203, December 2, 1997, 44 DCR 7498).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-42
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 29A-934.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-237
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-237, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 29A-934.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-217
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-217, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 29A-923.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29A-101.01.
